item.title: Technical Career Knowledge Roadmap
item.description: To those who want to learn Computer Security: Make sure you don’t focus solely on JUST what is considered cybersecurty and hacking, and instead learn a fair bit about how computers and networks work as well. Here is a rough list: A bit of programing. At least enough to be able to write a script to process text. A bit of digital electronics. At least enough to know what a and gate and a xor is.
